channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [SAMHI] Samhi Hotels Ltd Incorporates Wholly-Owned Subsidiary SAMHI Skyline Private Limited
item.description:
Samhi Hotels Ltd has incorporated a wholly-owned subsidiary company named SAMHI Skyline Private Limited on 16th January 2026. The new subsidiary has been registered with an authorized share capital of INR 10,00,000 (Indian Rupees Ten Lakhs Only) and will carry on the business to purchase, manage, own, acquire, lease, promote, takeover or lease and to operate and run hotels, holiday resorts, motels, cottages, and accommodations of all description in India or abroad. The entire Paid-up Share Capital of INR 1,00,000 (Indian Rupees One Lakh Only) will be held by SAMHI Hotels Limited, the Holding Company.

  • Samhi Hotels Ltd incorporates a wholly-owned subsidiary, SAMHI Skyline Private Limited
  • New subsidiary registered with an authorized share capital of INR 10,00,000
  • SAMHI Skyline to operate in the Hotel business with all facilities in India or abroad
  • The entire Paid-up Share Capital of INR 1,00,000 held by SAMHI Hotels Limited, the Holding Company

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Samhi Hotels Ltd | Category: New Launch

item.title: [WELCORP] Welspun Corp Ltd Acquires 2.57% Stake in Welspun Mauritius Holdings for USD 5.962 Million
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Welspun Corp Ltd has approved the acquisition of a 2.57% equity stake in Welspun Mauritius Holdings Limited (WMHL) from Welspun Pipes Inc., USA, a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Company. The transaction is valued at not more than USD 5.962 million and is expected to streamline the Companyâ€™s overseas holding structure. The transaction does not have any material impact on the operations, financial position, or profitability of the Company.

  • Welspun Corp Ltd to acquire a 2.57% equity stake in Welspun Mauritius Holdings Limited
  • Transaction valued at not more than USD 5.962 million
  • Objective is to streamline the Companyâ€™s overseas holding structure
  • No material impact on the operations, financial position, or profitability of the Company
  • Transaction to be completed by FY 2025-2026

item.title: [WELCORP] Welspun Corp Ltd Acquires 2.57% Equity Stake in Welspun Mauritius Holdings Limited for USD 5.962 Million
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Welspun Corp Ltd has approved the acquisition of a 2.57% equity stake in Welspun Mauritius Holdings Limited from Welspun Pipes Inc., USA, a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Company. The transaction is valued at not exceeding USD 5.962 million, subject to regulatory compliances. Upon completion, Welspun Mauritius Holdings Limited will become a direct wholly-owned subsidiary of the Company. The objective of the proposed acquisition is to streamline the Companyâ€™s overseas holding structure.

  • Welspun Corp Ltd to acquire 2.57% equity stake in Welspun Mauritius Holdings Limited
  • Transaction valued at not exceeding USD 5.962 million
  • Welspun Mauritius Holdings Limited to become direct wholly-owned subsidiary of the Company
  • Acquisition aimed at streamlining the Companyâ€™s overseas holding structure
  • No impact on the Consolidated Financials

item.title: [THYROCARE] Thyrocare Technologies Ltd: Statutory Auditor M S K A & Associates Converts to LLP
item.description:
Thyrocare Technologies Ltd has been informed about the conversion of its Statutory Auditor, M S K A & Associates, into a Limited Liability Partnership (LLP) under the Limited Liability Partnership Act, 2008. The new name of the auditor is MSKA& Associates LLP (LLPIN: ACT-3789), with ICAI Firm Registration Number 105047W (Old) / W101187 (New). This conversion does not result in a change of audit responsibilities, resignation, or appointment of a new auditor; the audit engagement continues uninterrupted.

  • Thyrocare Technologies Ltd's Statutory Auditor, M S K A & Associates, has converted into a Limited Liability Partnership (LLP) named MSKA& Associates LLP.
  • The conversion does not lead to any changes in audit responsibilities, resignation, or appointment of a new auditor.
  • The audit engagement continues uninterrupted.
  • MSKA& Associates LLP has ICAI Firm Registration Number 105047W (Old) / W101187 (New).
  • The conversion is in compliance with Regulation 30 and Schedule III of the SEBI Listing Regulations.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Thyrocare Technologies Ltd | Category: Auditor Update

item.title: [WAAREEENER] Waaree Energies Ltd to Approve Q3 and Nine Months Results on Jan 21, 2026
item.description:
Waaree Energies Ltd has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on January 21, 2026, to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The meeting is scheduled in accordance with the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, and the Company's Insider Trading Code under the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015. The trading window for dealing in the securities of the Company will be closed for all the Directors, Key Managerial Persons, Designated Persons of the Company and their Immediate Relatives from January 01, 2026, till 48 hours after the declaration of the Unaudited Financial Results.

  • Waaree Energies Ltd to consider and approve Unaudited Financial Results for Q3 and nine months ended December 31, 2025
  • The meeting is scheduled in accordance with the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
  • The trading window for dealing in the securities of the Company will be closed for all the Directors, Key Managerial Persons, Designated Persons of the Company and their Immediate Relatives from January 01, 2026, till 48 hours after the declaration of the Unaudited Financial Results

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Waaree Energies Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [DODLA] Dodla Dairy Ltd to Approve Q4 2025 Financial Results on Jan 27, 2026
item.description:
Dodla Dairy Ltd has announced a meeting of the Board of Directors on January 27, 2026, to consider and approve the unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter ended 31 December 2025. The meeting will take place at the company's registered office in Hyderabad, Telangana, India. The trading window for all designated persons and their immediate relatives will remain closed until 48 hours after the declaration of the financial results.

  • Dodla Dairy Ltd to approve Q4 2025 financial results on Jan 27, 2026
  • The meeting will be held at the company's registered office in Hyderabad, Telangana, India
  • Trading window to remain closed until 48 hours after the declaration of financial results
  • The unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter ended 31 December 2025 will be considered and approved

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Dodla Dairy Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [INDIGO] InterGlobe Aviation Committed to Addressing Operational Disruptions and Ensuring Robustness
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

InterGlobe Aviation Ltd, the company behind IndiGo, has received orders from the Directorate General of Civil Aviation of India regarding major operational disruptions in early December 2025. The company, through its Board and Management, has committed to addressing the issues and taking appropriate measures in a thoughtful and timely manner. An in-depth review of internal processes has been underway to ensure the airline's resilience and robustness. IndiGo remains committed to serving India and contributing to its growth as a Global aviation major by 2030.

  • InterGlobe Aviation Ltd received orders from the Directorate General of Civil Aviation regarding operational disruptions in December 2025.
  • Company committed to addressing the issues and taking appropriate measures.
  • An in-depth review of internal processes is underway to ensure resilience and robustness.
  • IndiGo remains committed to serving India and contributing to its growth as a Global aviation major by 2030.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: InterGlobe Aviation Ltd | Category: Business Update

item.title: [CGPOWER] CG Power Secures Â¥900 Crore Power Transformers Order from Tallgrass for US Data Center Segment
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

CG Power and Industrial Solutions Limited has secured a landmark order valued at ~Â¥900 Crore ($99.2M) from Tallgrass Integrated Logistics Solutions LLC USA, for a large-scale data center project in the United States. This order marks CG's entry into the global data center segment and is the largest single order ever won by CG. The transformers will be designed, manufactured, and tested at CGâ€™s state-of-the-art facilities in India and will be executed over a delivery period of 12 to 20 months.

  • This order marks CG's entry into the global data center segment and is the largest single order ever won by CG.
  • The transformers will be designed, manufactured, and tested at CGâ€™s state-of-the-art facilities in India.

item.title: [SHIPWAVES] Shipwaves Online Ltd Secures USD 58,000 Purchase Order from National Energy Services Reunited DMCC
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Shipwaves Online Limited has received a purchase order worth USD 58,000 (equivalent to Rs. 52,61,180/-) from M/s. National Energy Services Reunited DMCC for the deployment of its Shipment Orchestrator Platform. This platform will enable and support end-to-end order and logistics management across procurement, inventory, and freight operations of M/s. National Energy Services Reunited DMCC.

  • Shipwaves Online Ltd has secured a purchase order worth USD 58,000 from National Energy Services Reunited DMCC.
  • The order is for the deployment of the Shipment Orchestrator Platform.
  • The platform will support end-to-end order and logistics management across procurement, inventory, and freight operations of National Energy Services Reunited DMCC.
  • The order is worth approximately Rs. 52,61,180/-.
  • This is a significant deal for Shipwaves Online Ltd in the international market.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Shipwaves Online Ltd | Category: Deals

item.title: [TLL] Trident Lifeline Ltd Approves Un-Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for Q3 and Nine Months Ended 31st December, 2025
item.description:
Trident Lifeline Ltd announced the outcome of its Board Meeting held on 17th January, 2026. The Board approved and took on record the Un-Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2025. The company's revenue from operations for the nine months ended 31st December, 2025, stands at INR 7,246.47 crores. The company's net profit for the same period is INR 500.40 crores. The company's earnings per equity share (basic and diluted) for the nine months ended 31st December, 2025, is INR 2.63.

  • Trident Lifeline Ltd approved Un-Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2025.
  • The company's revenue from operations for the nine months ended 31st December, 2025, stands at INR 7,246.47 crores.
  • The company's net profit for the same period is INR 500.40 crores.
  • The company's earnings per equity share (basic and diluted) for the nine months ended 31st December, 2025, is INR 2.63.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Trident Lifeline Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result
